job_tasks.phrase: define, develop and run the next version of our rendering technology (both from a creative tooling & pipeline perspective and our end-user software).
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the core software engineering task of developing and running new versions of technology, encompassing both tooling and end-user software, which aligns with building and integrating software applications.

job_tasks.phrase: Guiding and make pipeline technology choices and define the future architecture of our technology platform.
job_tasks.justification: Defining technology choices and future architecture are fundamental software engineering activities related to system design and development.

job_tasks.phrase: Close collaboration with our Grip development and technical teams to identify shared (technical) approaches.
job_tasks.justification: This involves working with other technical teams to define technical approaches, which is a core aspect of software development and integration.

job_tasks.phrase: Collaborating with our artists to develop the tools and automation they need.
job_tasks.justification: Developing tools and automation for users (artists in this case) is a direct software development task.

job_tasks.phrase: Build, test & deploy frequent changes and updates to the pipeline.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly describes the process of building, testing, and deploying software changes, which falls under software development and operations, akin to CI/CD practices.

job_tasks.phrase: In close collaboration with our CTO and different technical and artistic teams
job_tasks.justification: This phrase explicitly mentions collaboration with various teams and leadership, fitting the definition of communication and collaboration.

job_tasks.phrase: Close collaboration with our Grip development and technical teams
job_tasks.justification: This highlights collaboration with specific technical teams, aligning with the communication and collaboration category.
This indicates working together with artists, which is a form of collaboration.

job_tasks.phrase: Document and possibly train artists to use the pipeline
job_tasks.justification: Documenting and training users on a system involves communication and knowledge sharing, key aspects of collaboration.

profile.rationale: The job advertisement focuses entirely on software development, pipeline management, and collaboration within technical and artistic teams. There is no mention of AI/ML tasks, models, or related technologies. The core responsibilities align with 'Macro-Category A: Core Software Engineering', specifically '1.A.1. Software Development & Integration' and '1.A.2. Operations & MLOps (LLMOps)' for pipeline operations. Therefore, the most appropriate profile is 'Software Engineer'.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is very clear about its focus on rendering technology and pipeline development. There are no mentions of AI/ML, making the classification straightforward and unambiguous.
